caption.center: KATHLEEN KOSMAL, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SBC AMERITECH MICHIGAN,

opinion.opinion_text:
SC: 130324, COA: 254144, Macomb CC: 02-005738-CD.
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 6, 2005 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
